description: There are hipster offerings such as beef rendang tacos or viral cheese coin. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Trendy treats at Geylang Serai Ramadan Bazaar: Gummy bear soda, bingtanghulu and more
title_page: Trendy treats at Geylang Serai Ramadan Bazaar: Gummy bear soda, bingtanghulu and more | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – This year’s Geylang Serai Ramadan Bazaar may be a more pared-down affair, but it is no less bustling than before.
There are about 500 stalls this time, compared with 700 booths in 2023.
